name: clientServerInitialized
shortDescription: Checks if a RPC client's RPC server was successfully (and still is) registered.
description: This method checks, if a RPC client's RPC server is registered and connected to Homegear. You can register your RPC "event" server by calling init.

parameters.name: interfaceId
parameters.description: The interface ID as specified in init.

returnValue: Returns "True", when the RPC client's RPC server was successfully registered and still is connected or "False" otherwise.
